rules_text:
Whenever this creature enters or transforms into Kholon Astrologist, you mill two cards, draw a card, and lose 1 life.
{1}{B}: Transform Kholon Astrologist. Activate only if it’s attacking.
rules_text2:
Whenever this creature transforms into Dreaming Butcher, it gains indestructible until end of turn.
Dreaming Butcher’ power is equal to the number of cards in your graveyard.
At the beginning of your end step, if Dreaming Butcher didn’t attack this turn, transform it.
